summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Richard Kahn, Amanda Kirby, and Harry Beller discussing the status of a project related to JPM. Richard Kahn confirms that there is nothing left to address regarding JPM and suggests it can be removed from the watch list.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is confirming the completion of a task related to JPM and instructing Amanda Kirby to remove it from her list.

persons.context: Amanda Kirby is inquiring about the status of JPM and whether it can be removed from her watch list.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is copied on the email as he was previously involved in the JPM project.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is mentioned in the email but does not have an active role in the correspondence.

Amanda Kirby includes Harry Beller in the correspondence, indicating they work together on related projects.
